name: Add TextMagic contacts to a Google Sheets spreadsheet by specific query
description: Every time when you search TextMagic contacts by specific query, Make will automatically add that contact to a new row in a Google Sheets spreadsheet. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1DCPcBVmLDWOXocJLhF35CKfV65VCctHJMO4jFBjW4b4/edit?usp=sharing).
